Title: Requires employers to pay employees who are manual workers no less than semi-monthly
Summary: Requires employers to pay employees who are manual workers no less than semi-monthly; provides that there is no civil penalty against an employer by an employee who unknowingly violates such provisions; authorizes the commissioner to levy a civil penalty against employers who violate such provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the frequency of payment of wages for certain employees
